org.croudtrip.trips

Class TripsUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.croudtrip.trips.TripsUtils

  • public class TripsUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper methods for dealing with offers, join requests, etc.

    • Method Summary

      Computes how many passengers actually will be picked up or sit in the car

    • Method Detail

      • getActivePassengerCountForOffer

        public int getActivePassengerCountForOffer(TripOffer offer)
        Computes how many passengers actually will be picked up or sit in the car
        Parameters:
        offer - the offer for which you want to compute the passenger count
        Returns:
        the count of passengers that are still actively related to this offer

      • updateArrivalTimesForOffer

        public void updateArrivalTimesForOffer(TripOffer offer)
        Updates all the arrival times for the passengers that are waiting for the driver in this offer and inform the passengers via GCM.
        Parameters:
        offer - The offer that should be updated.

      • updateArrivalTimesForOffer

        public void updateArrivalTimesForOffer(TripOffer offer,
                              User noReceiver)
        Updates all the arrival times for the passengers that are waiting for the driver in this offer and inform the passengers via GCM. This method is used if a new passenger was accepted. The newly accepted passenger will not be informed if he is passed as an additional parameter.
        Parameters:
        offer - the offer that should be updated
        noReceiver - a certain user that will not receive a GCM
